SELECT *

FROM
(

SELECT DISTINCT

A.PARTNER,

CASE 
WHEN B.ZZSITUATION = 'DV' THEN 'DV' 
END AS DV_CHECK

FROM "CUSTOMER"."CRM_BUT000" A
LEFT JOIN "CUSTOMER_PERSONAL"."ZCMKTT_CUSTPROT" B ON A.PARTNER = B.ZZBP


WHERE A.PARTNER IN


('0121798968',
'0121118212',
'0126804153',
'0900792455',
'0126804153',
'0121798968',
'0121118212',
'0121555332',
'0121299431',
'0121635088',
'0131552812',
'0126070194',
'0121902237',
'0121902237',
'0900644967',
'0121299431',
'0131129753',
'0131400150',
'0900644967',
'0130636357',
'0121896790',
'0131131084',
'0121896790',
'0130751626',
'0121496807',
'0121054274',
'0900780519',
'0121170610',
'0121170610',
'0122699671',
'0131185131',
'0123603540',
'0129109028',
'0121496807',
'0124295077',
'0124295077',
'0124860636',
'0124389028',
'0121614329',
'0125168757',
'0131290969',
'0131229889',
'0128597843',
'0131124544',
'0125581650',
'0131093671',
'0125313349',
'0130751626',
'0902889814',
'0902889814',
'0130967138',
'0131171178',
'0131190822',
'0131192504',
'0900780519')


) A
WHERE A.DV_CHECK = 'DV'
